class.name: KotlinScriptCustomBuildStep
class.description: A build step running a Kotlin script with the specified content

function.name: kotlinScript
function.description: Adds a build step running a Kotlin script with the specified content @see KotlinCustomScriptBuildStep

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for the script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: scriptContent
param.description: Content of the script to run

param.name: kotlinArgs
param.description: Space-separated list of additional arguments for Kotlin script

param.name: target.jdk.home
param.description: Custom [JDK](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Predefined+Build+Parameters#PredefinedBuildParameters-DefiningJava-relatedEnvironmentVariables) to use. The default is JAVA_HOME environment variable or the agent's own Java.

param.name: jvmArgs
param.description: Space-separated list of additional arguments for JVM
